item.description:
Welcome to Twisted Touring, a subsidiary of the Greater Boston Scooter Clubs

"The Premiere Scooter Club of New England"



Twisted Touring is dedicated to the thrill of the ride with the destination while seldom boring, is still just an excuse. There will be many rides in 2013 ranging from 30 to well over 300 miles, from an afternoon ride to overnight trips to the fringes of New England and beyond crossing every border to the Bay State.

Twisted Touring is intended for scooters and riders who can take on the highway as well as the back road twisties, in rain or shine. We take our safety seriously, even when it might not be convenient.

Bottom line:

If you can't or don't want to ride on the highway..

This isn't the club for you.

By joining you are saying that you want to tour and support the club, supporting the club means an annual $20 membership fee payable by April fools day along with a membership form. The form is available in the files section.

Looking forward to meeting you!

Paul Shoemaker - Organizer
item.name: Twisted Touring
